articles.title: Dream11 now principal jersey sponsor of Indian cricket team - Adda247
articles.description: According to reports, the popular fantasy gaming platform Dream11 has reportedly taken over as the main jersey sponsor for the Indian cricket team from July 2023 to March 2026, replacing Byju’s. The deal was reportedly secured at a base price of Rs 358 crore.…
